channel.title: Attack methods glitched? [Pi]
channel.description:
Project Insanity 317 Mtpv2
Ok i just turned on the exp so you can train on monsters, anyways.
When u use punch (witch should give attack xp) it trains str when u use kick ( witch should give str xp ) gives def when u use block (witch should give def xp) gives attack.
When u use a weapon. training lets say whip. ill train attack with it. and it works perfect xp, but if im fighting and i take off whip it shows that when whips on attack. when i take off it switches to block witch gives the attack xp.
so my question is.
how do i make it so when u punch attck xp kick str xp block def xp. and my other items reconize this???
THANKS!
